Message.Title: Talk About Lunacy
Message.Msg: Dem lawmakers in Calif proposing legislation that requires gun owners to buy liability insurance to cover damages or injuries caused by their weapons. So, a criminal can steal your gun, use it in a homicide and your liable. The Dems never fail to make a case for dumb solutions. No wonder people are fleeing this state in masses. They haven't done enough to screw things up. The results speak for themselves. I can't wait until my husband retires and he can do that when he's 59 with full pay. We've settled on Big Sky Montana where they believe in personal responsibility, crime is minimal and there is no sales tax. The best part is living out of Calif he won't pay state tax on his pension. It's not surprising that liberal states are all broke. They're running out the people who keep the state solvent.
